deity_markdown: [Achaekek](/Deities.aspx?ID=325), [Ananshea](/Deities.aspx?ID=592), [Angazhan](/Deities.aspx?ID=644), [Cernunnos](/Deities.aspx?ID=513), [Cihua Coatl](/Deities.aspx?ID=413), [Dammerich](/Deities.aspx?ID=646), [Eiseth](/Deities.aspx?ID=590), [Erastil](/Deities.aspx?ID=282), [Falayna](/Deities.aspx?ID=471), [General Susumu](/Deities.aspx?ID=306), [Genzaeri](/Deities.aspx?ID=342), [Gorum](/Deities.aspx?ID=283), [Iomedae](/Deities.aspx?ID=285), [Kaldemash](/Deities.aspx?ID=349), [Kazutal](/Deities.aspx?ID=350), [Milani](/Deities.aspx?ID=352), [Neith](/Deities.aspx?ID=636), [Otolmens](/Deities.aspx?ID=145), [Pahti Coatl](/Deities.aspx?ID=414), [Ragathiel](/Deities.aspx?ID=481), [Raumya](/Deities.aspx?ID=619), [Sekhmet](/Deities.aspx?ID=639), [Shizuru](/Deities.aspx?ID=315), [Smiad](/Deities.aspx?ID=522), [Sorrow's Sword](/Deities.aspx?ID=249), [Srikalis, Sritaming, and Sribaril](/Deities.aspx?ID=302), [Talons Of The Godclaw](/Deities.aspx?ID=383), [Wulgren](/Deities.aspx?ID=562), [Yaezhing](/Deities.aspx?ID=318), [Zjar-Tovan](/Deities.aspx?ID=360)

markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 379 <sup>4.0</sup>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Add the following text to the end of true strike: "You are then temporarily immune to true strike for 10 minutes."_

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Bloodline**
[Draconic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=5)

**Deities**
[Achaekek](/Deities.aspx?ID=325), [Ananshea](/Deities.aspx?ID=592), [Angazhan](/Deities.aspx?ID=644), [Cernunnos](/Deities.aspx?ID=513), [Cihua Coatl](/Deities.aspx?ID=413), [Dammerich](/Deities.aspx?ID=646), [Eiseth](/Deities.aspx?ID=590), [Erastil](/Deities.aspx?ID=282), [Falayna](/Deities.aspx?ID=471), [General Susumu](/Deities.aspx?ID=306), [Genzaeri](/Deities.aspx?ID=342), [Gorum](/Deities.aspx?ID=283), [Iomedae](/Deities.aspx?ID=285), [Kaldemash](/Deities.aspx?ID=349), [Kazutal](/Deities.aspx?ID=350), [Milani](/Deities.aspx?ID=352), [Neith](/Deities.aspx?ID=636), [Otolmens](/Deities.aspx?ID=145), [Pahti Coatl](/Deities.aspx?ID=414), [Ragathiel](/Deities.aspx?ID=481), [Raumya](/Deities.aspx?ID=619), [Sekhmet](/Deities.aspx?ID=639), [Shizuru](/Deities.aspx?ID=315), [Smiad](/Deities.aspx?ID=522), [Sorrow's Sword](/Deities.aspx?ID=249), [Srikalis, Sritaming, and Sribaril](/Deities.aspx?ID=302), [Talons Of The Godclaw](/Deities.aspx?ID=383), [Wulgren](/Deities.aspx?ID=562), [Yaezhing](/Deities.aspx?ID=318), [Zjar-Tovan](/Deities.aspx?ID=360)

**Patron Theme**
[Fate](/Patrons.aspx?ID=3)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the end of your turn
</row>

</column>

---

A glimpse into the future ensures your next blow strikes true. The next time you make an attack roll before the end of your turn, roll the attack twice and use the better result. The attack ignores circumstance penalties to the attack roll and any flat check required due to the target being concealed or hidden.
name: True Strike

text: True Strike Single Action Source Core Rulebook pg. 379 4.0 PFS Note Add the following text to the end of true strike: "You are then temporarily immune to true strike for 10 minutes." Traditions Arcane, Occult Bloodline Draconic Deities Achaekek, Ananshea, Angazhan, Cernunnos, Cihua Coatl, Dammerich, Eiseth, Erastil, Falayna, General Susumu, Genzaeri, Gorum, Iomedae, Kaldemash, Kazutal, Milani, Neith, Otolmens, Pahti Coatl, Ragathiel, Raumya, Sekhmet, Shizuru, Smiad, Sorrow's Sword, Srikalis, Sritaming, and Sribaril, Talons Of The Godclaw, Wulgren, Yaezhing, Zjar-Tovan Patron Theme Fate Cast verbal Duration until the end of your turn --- A glimpse into the future ensures your next blow strikes true. The next time you make an attack roll before the end of your turn, roll the attack twice and use the better result. The attack ignores circumstance penalties to the attack roll and any flat check required due to the target being concealed or hidden.
